Text: I've not seen this version, but I just watched this the other week and it is a MAMMOTH EPIC!  The best frontal assault of ANY movie I have ever seen! (in part 2)  John Woo does the business in this one, and I highly recommend it to medieval war movie lovers... Mythical Being characters, Ridiculously realistic filming in parts, and just bloody brilliant... The frontal assault makes The Two Towers look pants... :)  hope its a good download everyone cos this film deserves it!
I'm new here do u get English subtitles with this  film or do i need to get them from somewhere else?

exremezone the spamking

fucking die already!!

First time, asking for help...

using uTorrent I can't get the pre-window to open so I can view and deselect some files. (No matter what combination of check boxes I do in Preferences.) Anyone experiencing the same thing?

I would like to see the files first.... Again...

Thanks to any helpers!

random-critic...

--Click on Preferences (it's the cog next to the arrows on the toolbar). 
--Look for UI Settings, then under "When Adding Torrents".
--Check the box next to "Show a window..."

That should do the trick; good luck.

I just saw this movie. It has among the best medieval war scenes I have ever seen. The acting is good. It is sad to see that English speaking war movie lovers are missing on this one!
Thanks, extremezon!
